category.name: Product Structure.QSearch Configuration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: QS_NX_RELATION_POST_ACTION_ENABLED
preference.preference_description: Determines if Teamcenter generates bounding box data automatically when you import NX assemblies. This preference is effective both for product-scoped cacheless search and full database cacheless search. Valid Values: true - Teamcenter generates bounding box data for imported NX assemblies. false - Teamcenter does not generate bounding box data for imported NX assemblies.
